website_summaries.verdict: Known to be less sweet than other LUNA bars, this smooth coconut flavor is a go-to for people wanting a fruity snack.
pros: A fantastic choice for those who love crunch
many customers compare the texture to rice cereal
Buyers enjoy the light chocolate coating
cons: Many wish the bar had a stronger coconut taste

customer_reviews.title: Love the amount of calories, love the taste even more
customer_reviews.text: So I recently tried this out and this has quickly become my all time fav go-to. I workout every day and try to control my calories but those other bars just really really don't taste good after a while. This one is perfect. Not too sweet, tastes good tho, and the coconut with chocolate is just perfect. I've tried Luna's lemon bars too and they are amazing as well.
customer_reviews.author: Queen of Hearts

customer_reviews.title: Great cookie snack, sweet, salty, dry, crumbly (not gooey) not at all chocolate flavored..
customer_reviews.text: These are more like a cookie, kind of buttery (fat) tasting, rich, thick, very salty and very sweet. Not chocolate at all, other than for appearance. They are good of you are in the mood for very sweet , salty, dry and crumbly cookie type snack. Very "carb" rich. It goes well with a nice cup of tea or coffee.. If you are wanting a chocolate or coconut taste/ flavor, this is NOT it. I didn't taste either. It is very good for a dry cookie- like salt sweet craving. I wanted something with chocolate and coconut. These are good, just not what I wanted at all.
customer_reviews.author: pen💮

customer_reviews.title: Healthy on the go snack
customer_reviews.text: Good taste with sufficient protein for my busy daughter as a healthy midmorning or afterschool snack.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Rohrbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great and filling.
customer_reviews.text: The chocolate dipped coconut tastes just like almond joy bars. Filling and perfect for snacks or when you’re running late. Warning: they melt easily! If they melt just toss it in the fridge. They cool quickly and will be ready to eat :)
customer_reviews.author: Rider22

customer_reviews.title: Tastes is ok but not coco nutty
customer_reviews.text: These are ok. They don't have much of a coconut flavor. They are full of crispy ..think rice cereal..crunchies. Chocolate on the bottom and lines of chocolate on the top under some kind of "candy, like layer. I was looking for more coconut. Wrapper is a little misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Lblazin

customer_reviews.title: Vegan
customer_reviews.text: A tasty vegan treat that even the world's pickiest eater(cough cough my kid cough) will enjoy. The flavor is spot on and it's a nice little energy boost when you hit that inevitable afternoon slump!
customer_reviews.author: Alison B

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: These do not taste like I thought they would. They are OK, but I will not be re-ordering these.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Where's the coconut?
customer_reviews.text: You cannot taste the coconut. The wrapper picture is misleading. The ingredients include a bunch of grains and syrups and sugar, then coconut OIL, then more syrups and oils. Coconut is almost the last ingredient, just before salt and flavors. Bait and switch.
customer_reviews.author: Betty W.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: very disappointing as a protein bar. Basically nothing but a glorified cookie.
customer_reviews.author: Montana Rose

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate coconut
customer_reviews.text: I really like these but it has no coconut flavor at all and thats why I got that one bc I love coconut and chocolate.
customer_reviews.author: Darby B.

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate dipped coconut-one of the best flavors yet!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars!!! Blueberry and chocolate dipped coconut are probably my favorite flavors. I typically throw two of these in my bag each day for work. Very satisfying!!!
customer_reviews.author: SBell

customer_reviews.title: Coconut Lovers Will love the Flavor
customer_reviews.text: A very good gluten-free Bar by Luna. The flavor jolts you to life. Eating one is enough for your snack between meals. Great as a hiking or biking snack. Gives you enough umpf to get through until your next meal. Keep on hand, always. Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.author: CaitlynOnTheFly

customer_reviews.title: Really good and they don't bother my stomach like most protein ...
customer_reviews.text: Really good and they don't bother my stomach like most protein bars. I don't digest a lot of protein items well so i was very glad to find these are gentle on my stomach. I cannot speak for anyone else with stomach issues but they are great for me and they actually taste great.
customer_reviews.author: Ricki

customer_reviews.title: Strange flavor
customer_reviews.text: I like Luna bars and I had a Mounds candy bar flavor in mind when I ordered these. The flavor was a bit strange and not enjoyable. They didn’t really taste like coconut or chocolate.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy S. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Good but stale
customer_reviews.text: I usually love these but they were so stale. Seller gave me my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Regina Baker

customer_reviews.title: Tasty. Just don't leave in the sun.
customer_reviews.text: Tasty and filling. Just don't leave it in your car on a hot day! I keep mine in a cooler when travelling. Great pick me up for energy. Very tasty.
customer_reviews.author: Road Scholar

customer_reviews.title: Note to Luna Bars: Fix this flavor, please!
customer_reviews.text: These bars are not bad tasting as-is. However, the combo of coconut + chocolate has so much potential! This epic potential is dependent upon the presence of *both* flavors: chocolate & coconut. As it stands now, there is no discernible coconut flavor... I am a big fan of other Luna bars (blueberry, lemon zest, & chocolate peppermint come immediately to mind), but this falls far from its potential. I know you can make this awesome, Luna peeps...
customer_reviews.author: njm

customer_reviews.title: In love with the Luna
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy my Luna Bars individually at about $2-$2.50 a bar. I was thrilled that I found them on amazon. They are delicious and make a great snack.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: My youngest stepdaughter loves these. I think they taste good and I like that they have some nutrition.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Good but pricey.
customer_reviews.text: Good bars but pricey. For what they cost, should be double the bars.
customer_reviews.author: Diane F.

customer_reviews.title: I’m addicted
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful and not to bad for you as a sweet snack. I put them in the freezer, then let it sit a few minutes and eat them 1/2 frozen. YUM!
customer_reviews.author: DHolliy

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Great price came early. Came in original packaging. Love this pbrand of bars. Highly recommend the candy cane chocolate ones.
customer_reviews.author: Shareni

customer_reviews.title: Great breakfast or snack
customer_reviews.text: These bars are filling , high protein , good flavor
customer_reviews.author: PLS

customer_reviews.title: Super good!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great taste like an Almond Joy bar. Protein, fiber, vitamins and perfect pocket snack to take along for a long walk or run. Highly recommend the full line of Luna bars. Not just for women anymore!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer RSS

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, Delicious Taste! Helps Stave Off Midday Hunger.
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Perfect for those 3pm munchies I get at work. Staves off my midday hunger while still being tasty and even somewhat-healthy. I'd say that this flavor is probably my favorite power bar flavor of all the ones I've ever tried (which is a lot!), so I'm glad that Prime Pantry offers these at a great price... even better than Walmart's!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Nahmias

customer_reviews.title: Missing 10bars from my 15bar pack!!
customer_reviews.text: Not happy! Ordered the box of 15 literally says a 15 count on the box. I opened what looked like a large brand new box....unfortunately there where 10bars missing from my box.... it only had 5 in them
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Not so coco for these coco's
customer_reviews.text: It's no secret that I am in love with Luna bars (I eat them everyday at work). Since I'm not a big, huge chocolate eater I couldn't eat these on a regular basis. And that's a bummer for me since coconut is my fave. They really do taste like chocolate and coconut so if you like that combination you are in for a treat. I didn't want to rate it low, just because I'm not a huge chocolate fan. Because it really is flavorful and yummy.
customer_reviews.author: Cuppycakes808

customer_reviews.title: Good but VERY sweet
customer_reviews.text: These are tasty but definitely dessert-like. Much sweeter than the other Luna bar flavors I’ve tried
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M.

customer_reviews.title: Taste great!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! Keep one in my purse all the time to hit that sweet tooth craving.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy I Campbell

customer_reviews.title: These taste like chemicals. There is nothing redeeming about them
customer_reviews.text: These taste like chemicals. There is nothing redeeming about them. I will stick with the lemon.
customer_reviews.author: Pinenut

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting bar
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting bar. This is my favorite tasting luna bar. I love the ingredients. I love the amount of protein and fiber they have along with being gluten free. These are not hard on my stomach like some of the Kind bars with all the nuts or the super low sugar bars that have a lot of sugar alcohol.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Feldman

customer_reviews.title: Too tasty to believe they are gluten free. . .
customer_reviews.text: Yummy! So good. Gluten free - with coconut - what more can a Celiac's girl ask for? My whole family likes these, and I actually have had to hide them to be sure I can get them for lunch on the go, after school tutoring sessions, etc. If you like Mounds candy bars - try these! Healthier, but sooo yummy.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: A great snack to have during the day love all of the LUNA bars I have tried so far.
customer_reviews.text: A great snack to have during the day love all of the LUNA bars I have tried so far.
customer_reviews.author: Stef Butterflies

customer_reviews.title: I love Luna bars
customer_reviews.text: I love Luna bars. I'm a big fan of coconut and this one hits the spot. Sweet but not too much and helps tide me over until I can have a real meal. I like to have some on hand in my baby bag and in my desk at work for those moments I just don't have time to stop and eat.
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with the taste and dry texture. Feels and tastes artificial unlike the lemon bar.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Haidar

customer_reviews.title: Taste great
customer_reviews.text: If you like chocolate and coconut, these are delicious! They taste like a chocolate macaroon cookie.
customer_reviews.author: jerseyJD

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I like them, great taste, good size' nice snack' or morning bar'
customer_reviews.author: 1999 Poncho

customer_reviews.title: Best bar out there
customer_reviews.text: I liked the idea of coconut and chocolate together so I thought I would give this bar a try. They are amazing! It tastes like a baked good rather than a nutrition bar. It has a chocolate layer on the bottom and toasted coconut on top and is so good! They also keep you satisfied and are great for a mini breakfast on the go. I am so glad that I found these bars and the Amazon price for them is great.
customer_reviews.author: amazonaddict

customer_reviews.title: Taste like almond joy candy bar!
customer_reviews.text: These are literally O. M. G. Good! Taste like almond joy candy bar!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super sweet, and the chocolate has a very low ...
customer_reviews.text: Super sweet, and the chocolate has a very low melting point so that it is usually a total mess to eat. Not terrible, but not worth reordering.
customer_reviews.author: eli

customer_reviews.title: Everyone enjoys these
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy theseand my family is gluten free. I’m not and I like them too
customer_reviews.author: Andrea411

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like a metal, like tin or aluminum
customer_reviews.text: Tried half of one bar - very metallic taste that lingered for a long time. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are great for an emergency snack
customer_reviews.text: A little too heavy tasting for me. My daughter loves them so it's a matter of personal taste. They are great for an emergency snack.
customer_reviews.author: ZCollBuell

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I will not buy this again Unfortunately. They taste okay but I did not realize they had so much soy in them! I need to read labels better before I buy things next time! I bought them because they were gluten free.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie 4 Jesus

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Taste of the Chocolate Dipped Coconut is good at first but has a very bad aftertaste. NOT a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Bell

customer_reviews.title: NOTHING bad to say about this!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG!!! I LOVE these!! One of the few tasty gluten-free treats I've encountered. My kids and I hike almost every day and now I have something I can bring on the trail that doesn't feel like I'm being tortured!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Health nut
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these chocolate coconut Luna bars. Bought one in the grocery store to try and then decided to check out Amazon to see if I could buy them cheaper. They were much cheaper to buy by the box. My son loves them too.
customer_reviews.author: Home shopper

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves these. She’s changed her lifestyle and has list 30 lbs. Thus is her treat! Yummy and so satisfying!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these bars!
customer_reviews.text: Love these bars! So tasty and filling. If you love coconut and chocolate, you will love these bars
customer_reviews.author: MAG

customer_reviews.title: I love these bars and its so much cheaper to get ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars and its so much cheaper to get them on here than at the store! You won't regret buying ALL THE BARS!!
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: Incredible, new favorite
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several Luna flavors that were just okay for me. Chocolate raspberry was my favorite. I am a loyal fan and get them on subscribe and save. Totally addicted. Then I saw these, and since I love coconut flavor (macaroons, Girl Scout's Samoas), I had to give them a try. As they say - O...M...G. They taste exactly like the aforementioned coconut cookies. They are to die for! Definitely my new favorite. Now I will have these and chocolate raspberry on every-other rotation. Cannot recommend these enough.
customer_reviews.author: Erinn S.

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Not to my personal taste, to me the coconut tastes artificial.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: I love coconut, and this tastes just like a Mounds ...
customer_reviews.text: I love coconut, and this tastes just like a Mounds candy bar! Pretty awesome for having fewer sugar grams than fruited yogurt!
customer_reviews.author: Jean C.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't like it. Too hard
customer_reviews.text: This not what I expected. Didn't like it. Too hard. I like them soft and yummy.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Fleek

customer_reviews.title: I’m so addicted to these!
customer_reviews.text: These don’t taste like you’re eating anything that could possibly be good for you. It’s like you’re eating some kind wonderful candy bar which is completely awesome
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L Jones

customer_reviews.title: This was my first time buying these. I would ...
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time buying these. I would buy them again. It is not to strong on the coconut flavor. I am willing to try other flavors now also.
customer_reviews.author: VickieKM

customer_reviews.title: The Luna Bar Chocolate Dipped Coconut bar is tasty and ...
customer_reviews.text: The Luna Bar Chocolate Dipped Coconut bar is tasty and Gluten Free. In my house that is a double win.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great to throw into your bag. Or purse for a not too guilty snack.
customer_reviews.author: sharilynn

customer_reviews.title: Expired
customer_reviews.text: My package arrived today 8/3 and the bars have a best by date of 6/22/19. I will definitely be returning
customer_reviews.author: Kas

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The bars are different than what I've been buying in the stores for the past year.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Chocolate coating melted
customer_reviews.text: Chocolate coating and topping all melted, not so good tasting as store bought
customer_reviews.author: Lumei X.

customer_reviews.title: They are healthy and they taste this good!?!  Wow!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been eating luna and Clif bars for what seems like forever. These Luna bars are just amazing and taste wonderful. I am thrilled I can now get them in the Prime Pantry, delivered right to my door! Often I don't have time for breakfast, so this is my go to meal. I also always carry 2 in my car and one in my purse and briefcase. I am on the go a lot and forget to eat. Having these around makes all the difference. Also, of I know I am going to be in a long meeting, I will bring enough bars for everyone. I find having a small snack makes everyone's brain reengage! ;-) Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Oceanfront

customer_reviews.title: It's like you are having a dessert
customer_reviews.text: These are very yummy! It's like you are having a dessert....I enjoy them for breakfast :) If you like coconut, I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Janna Michelle Butler

customer_reviews.title: 9g Protein for a Gluten-Free Bar
customer_reviews.text: I'm very picky with protein bars mostly due to taste. This Luna bar not only tastes great, not too sweet, bit also provides 9g of protein for a gluten-free bar!
customer_reviews.author: Mss F

customer_reviews.title: Great gluten free bar.
customer_reviews.text: Love these for a snack. Good gluten free snacks are hard to find but these are great!
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic snack! Great for grab and go
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic snack! Great for grab and go, or when I'm just not in the mood to make something myself.
customer_reviews.author: L. Macomber

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not the value I had hoped. Can get 12 packs for only a small amount more.
customer_reviews.author: krby34

customer_reviews.title: Good as expected!
customer_reviews.text: Taste the same as the ones I buy in the local grocery store. I have purchased 2 boxes so far and will probably purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: Bett72

customer_reviews.title: Best way to come in bulk!
customer_reviews.text: Super yummy and a great snack for a quick fix. My favorite flavor of Luna bar. Best way to buy them in bulk too.
customer_reviews.author: hannah

customer_reviews.title: These are great for a breakfast substitute
customer_reviews.text: These are great for a breakfast substitute. My husband eats them too and they taste much better than cliff bars. In a pinch, I can even occasionally give half of one to my daughter as a treat.
customer_reviews.author: Kappagirl

customer_reviews.title: All four of us love to keep it in the car or in our ...
customer_reviews.text: Second time I order this product. All four of us love to keep it in the car or in our purse for a snack. I like mine after it has been in the fridge for about 20-30 minutes. Great taste and if you like coconut you will love the texture.
customer_reviews.author: Grad2012

customer_reviews.title: Yum Yum Yum
customer_reviews.text: For those of us who love chocolate and coconut, these bars are fantastic! I had tried other Luna bars, but not these. I will be buying these again!
customer_reviews.author: savvy reviews

customer_reviews.title: Lunas Are Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love Luna protein bars! They are my go to bars. I buy 5 different boxes of them at a time in different flavors and eat them almost daily. They don't have that after taste that some other protein bars have. With the subscribe and save option I usually get each bar for about $1.
customer_reviews.author: travel life

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: I wrote a bad review but it was for larabar these are great.

customer_reviews.title: Rich source of protein, though.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. but a lot of coconut/palm oil is used. If you're a coconut person and you like your protein bars rich, take these for a spin. Coconut sucks, though, so dilute your weak bloodline.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Granola bar, not chocolate dipped coconut.
customer_reviews.text: This is a granola bar with chocolate and coconut. Not what I expected. Disappointed with product.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, I'm not big into products containing soy ...
customer_reviews.text: Great taste, I'm not big into products containing soy so I have to limit how often I eat these. I love chocolate, but it melts when traveling and gets a little messy, but is perfect for cooler areas such as home or work
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Coconut Bar
customer_reviews.text: Great coconut energy bar. The chocolate, however, is more like milk chocolate as opposed to dark. I prefer dark. For an extra protein boost after working out, I spread peanut butter on them.
customer_reviews.author: Cape Kayaker

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: No as good tasting as Kashi or Kind, but healthier I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: Charley Lee

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: These were pretty good, but not quite as delicious as I was expecting. They also melt ridiculously easy.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole H.

customer_reviews.title: Yum yum yum
customer_reviews.text: These can't be good for you, they taste too good! I am very pleased with the flavor and quality of these bars, and yes they are good for you. Someone stop me from eating the whole box!
customer_reviews.author: Texas Kate

customer_reviews.title: Best Flavor in AGES!
customer_reviews.text: I've been plugging these things to all of my friends, bars are generally alright. I rarely have a strong taste reaction to Luna bars (which are in my opinion the best tasting of most bars), but these are DELICIOUS! Keep these packed in your bag or desk and you will NOT be tempted by that chocolate bar in the vending machine. Reason why? Their taste strongly resembles Samoas, yes those delicious Girl Scout cookies you only get once a year and have polished off the box before you realize it. Best bar on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: These bars are my go-to snacks, I appreciate the extra vitamins and minerals, especially the iron. One bar has 30% of FDA's daily allowance for iron. I would assume this is 0.3 x 18 mg= 5.4 mg.
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: This is the only nutritional bar that I like! It has no weird after taste and goes ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the only nutritional bar that I like! It has no weird after taste and goes great with coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Coti

customer_reviews.title: Super delicious! Did not get tired of these over ...
customer_reviews.text: Super delicious! Did not get tired of these over 10 days of hiking and camping, which is not the case with most bars.
customer_reviews.author: CBCB

customer_reviews.title: tasty and satisfing
customer_reviews.text: On a 1000 calorie diet. These have been a life save. Easy meals on the go. Tasty and satisfing.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Street

customer_reviews.title: New favorite flavor
customer_reviews.text: This new coconut chocolate flavor is the bomb. the only problem is that the chocolate coating seems to melt at a lower temp than my other favorite (Nutz over Chocolate) and I end up with chocolate on my fingers/keyboard/scrubs... Now Amazon needs to stock this flavor and get them on the Subscribe and Save plan (hint, hint)
customer_reviews.author: lucythesplainer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to have around for a snack and to keep my blood sugar level
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in Price Increase
customer_reviews.text: Went from $14.99 to $26.85 overnight! Love Luna bars but not worth the price increase. Therefore the low rating.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Lageman

customer_reviews.title: Yummy bars
customer_reviews.text: Yum....I love Luna bars and this flavor is so tasty. It helps with my chocolate cravings.
customer_reviews.author: S. Wong

customer_reviews.title: she liked them a lot
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my wife, she liked them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: jackpine hunterdog

customer_reviews.title: I Don't Care For Them
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like this brand of energy bar. I have also tried other flavors of Luna bars and they all taste like hard-packed protein powder to me. (Gritty, powdery etc.)
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: A nice blend of coconut and chocolate
customer_reviews.text: A yummy, healthy-ish treat! A nice blend of coconut and chocolate, without any type of artificial taste as some other Luna bars have. Hard to find in stores, so I'm glad Amazon carries them!
customer_reviews.author: Observe_the_cat!

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Bar.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good tasting chocolate bar. However, it's small sized compared to what you're paying. Perhaps that's why it's priced low; the bars are small.
customer_reviews.author: Abdulla

customer_reviews.title: yummy
customer_reviews.text: Great taste and a great price. These are very hard to find in my local stores so this made it easy to get what I wanted. The only problem was I ordered them during a heat wave so the chocolate melted a bit but they are still yummy!
customer_reviews.author: S. A. Sutphin

customer_reviews.title: Delivered every month!
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite bars ever. Perfect for on the go to keep me going. I am not a chocolate person but I do love coconut. They are on my subscribe & save set for delivery every month! I keep them in the fridge during the summer.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: All these boxed GF items feel way too processed for ...
customer_reviews.text: All these boxed GF items feel way too processed for me; kept them but wont order again. I just continue to make homemade vs purchase...
customer_reviews.author: gms in ohio

customer_reviews.title: Like a candy bar.
customer_reviews.text: These are very tasty. Like an almond joy with no almond. And a lot fewer calories.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Roth

customer_reviews.title: The perfect healthy snack for when you crave sweets!
customer_reviews.text: Don't bother with cookies and snack size candy bars that leave you feeling guilty and hungry an hour later. This is the perfect meal supplement! For lunch have a veggie loaded salad and a large glass of water or milk. An hour later, have a Luna bar and you'll feel satiated and good about what you ate. Nothing about this tastes artificial so if its chocolate and coconut that you crave, its chocolate and coconut that you will taste. Even though its hard not to inhale it, try to take small bites and savor every bite!
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: My Fav!
customer_reviews.text: I love these Luna Coconut bars and they are my fav out of all of the LUNa bars. I don't know if this was the best price but I wanted a large box. I think the coconut flavor is great and the chocolate was just right.
customer_reviews.author: Angela T. Nelson

product_meta.title: LUNA BAR - Gluten Free Bars - Chocolate Dipped Coconut Flavor - (1.69 Ounce Snack Bars, 15 Count)
product_meta.description: LUNA Whole Nutrition Bars are crafted to help keep you nourished throughout your busy day and give you the energy to break through. Each bar is a delicious, gluten-free snack that’s perfect between meals.
feature_bullets: MORE OF THE STUFF YOU WANT: 8g protein and a low-glycemic index.
LESS OF THE STUFF YOU DON’T: Gluten free, with no artificial flavors or high-fructose corn syrup.
QUALITY INGREDIENTS: Plant-based, complete protein from soy provides essential amino acids. Carbohydrates come from organic oats and a blend of sugars with a low-glycemic index.
DELICIOUS FLAVORS AND VARIETY: LUNA Bars come in twelve craveable flavors.
CONVENIENCE: Wholesome, delicious on-the-go snack bars for energy whenever and wherever you need it.
